25.eng-name: The Office of the Judge (Kitab Al-Aqdiyah)

hadiths.text: Narrated Grandfather of Hirmas ibn Habib: I brought my debtor to the Holy Prophet (ﷺ). He said to me: Stick to him. He again said to me: O brother of Banu Tamim, what do you want to do with your prisoner

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي الْحَبْسِ فِي الدَّيْنِ وَغَيْرِهِ
chapter.eng-name: Regarding a person in debt, should he be detained?
